评论详情: It says it oversized but it really isn’t if your a bit bigger, I usually wear an XL or 1X depending on how big I want it, I got this shirt in a XXL seeing a review saying it runs smaller but it’s still not oversized it’s just a regular shirt. I’m not a big girl per se but I do have a big chest and it is a little tight on that part. So my bigger girlies I would suggest to keep looking, anyone that wears a size L or below just go a size up it should be just a little oversized for yall
